TopicTitle: Can we please get more methane fuel tanks?

Articles.Content: Can we pls just add all the Methalox tanks as methane tanks, wouldn't be to hard to add right?

This suggestion for the game's development has been moved to Suggestions and Development. 

Also, welcome to the forum.
Thanks for moving, sorry I'm new to this forum.

Has anybody noticed any difference between the models? I assumed they were the same but haven't actually compared them closely.

Smaller methane tanks would open up some opportunities for tiny planes. 

I would even like to see smaller jet engines. Maybe an rc-sized radially attached jet or something.
